required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Almonertinib/Pemetrexed/Carboplatin in EGFR T790M+ Advanced Lung Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Almonertinib Plus Pemetrexed and Carboplatin Versus Almonertinib Alone in Advanced NSCLC With EGFR T790M After First- or Second-generation TKIs Therapy: a Randomized, Controlled, Open-label, Phase 2 Study

brief_summary.textblock: Almonertinib Plus Pemetrexed and Carboplatin Versus Almonertinib Alone in Advanced NSCLC With EGFR T790M After First- or Second-generation TKIs Therapy: a Randomized, Controlled, Open-label, Phase 2 Study

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the first cycle of treatment (day one) to two month after the last cycle (each cycle is 21 days)

intervention.description: the standard therapy of single agent almonertinib
